docs.snippet: A Massachusetts judge sealed the records of the district court overseeing the murder investigation involving Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Massachusetts judge sealed the records of the district court overseeing the murder investigation involving Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez.
docs.abstract: Judge Mark E Sturdy of Attleboro District Court in Massachusetts seals court records relating to death of Odin Lloyd and murder investigation involving New England Patriots tight end Aaron Hernandez.

headline.main: Records Sealed in Murder Case Involving Hernandez
headline.print_headline: Records Sealed in Case Involving Hernandez

docs.snippet: President Dilma Rousseff of Brazil did not say the words "soccer" or "Olympics" in talking about how to address recent protests, but there is little doubt that sports play a role in the unrest....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Dilma Rousseff of Brazil did not say the words "soccer" or "Olympics" in talking about how to address recent protests, but there is little doubt that sports play a role in the unrest.

headline.main: Saying It All by Not Mentioning Soccer
headline.print_headline: Saying It All by Not Mentioning Soccer
